purpleculture_examples:
單位 [ dān wèi ]: unit (of measure); unit (group of people as a whole); work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform); Classifiers: 个
單純 [ dān chún ]: simple; pure; unsophisticated; merely; purely
單獨 [ dān dú ]: alone; by oneself; on one's own
單縣 [ shàn xiàn ]: Shan county in Heze 菏泽 , Shandong

heisig_chinese_memo: The chatterbox makes a list of his top ten brain teasers he likes to do when there is no one to talk to.
Ru_trainchinese:
dān: (графема) список, перечень, счет, квитанция, листок, бумага, записка
dān: (прил/нареч) один, одиночный, нечетный, однослойный; только, единственно
dān: (графема) один, единственный, простой, слабый
chán: (графема) Чань (используется в 单于)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: ten (十) x two mouths (吅) in the rice field (田) - should be simple!
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The farmers group together in an effort to stop dangerous animals from eating their livestock and crops.  They make a list of all the locations where they've found animal horns in their ten rice fields.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (單,单, dan, single) portrays a tool used for hunting In ancient times. There are two pebbles above , and underneath the pebbles there are lines in the shape of the letter V (). This is an ancient form of a stone slingshot for shooting a stone. The middle character (田, tian=t’ien, field) means “field”. So this character implies that one is hunting in the wide field with the slingshot. A slingshot can only shoot one stone at a time. Therefore, a long time later when the stone slingshot disappeared, this character was no longer used to mean a weapon, instead it came to mean “single.”
humanum_full_description_en:
A stone sword (Wu Shiqian) is tied to a branch on a golden inscription elephant. It is a weapon used for hunting or warfare. The field shape in the middle may resemble a rope wrapped around the handle so that it can be retracted after being thrown (Liu Xinglong), or it may resemble a tied stone (Gu Yankui). The characters from " single " as both sound and meaning symbols are related to hunting or war. Such as " War " means war, " bomb " means slingshot, " Satan " means do, "Satan residue" refers to destruction. " Single " means one, which may be a fake.

Oracles are used as clan names and place names, such as "Dongdan", "Nandan", "Xidan", and "Beidan" are some royal clans; as place names, it is the residence of some royal clans (Yu Weichao). The inscription is used as the country’s name, and the country’s surname is Ji, and then the country’s surname, Shan Bo Li: "Shan Bo (Bo) Chu Fu Zha (made) Zhong (Zhong) Xi Zun Li." "Shan Bo" is single monarch, the title is a primary, "Yuan father" is a single primary name, " Ge " is a cooking device, but also a vessel for holding food, the whole sentence was intended that single parent is a secondary Bo Yuan Ji Ge cast.

Under the bamboo slips of the Warring States Period, add the " kou " next to the decoration pen made "嘼" (that is, the word " beast " followed ), and the pass is " shang ", which means fear, "Guodian Jian. "Six Virtues" Jane 16: "Ju (Gou) sad (ji) lady's kindness, labor is not (its) strength of the brachial, not dare to (sorry), danger is not (its) death is not dare to love, stomach (that is) It is [the minister]." "The thigh and arm" are often used as a metaphor for the auxiliary minister. It means that if you can increase the virtue of a person, you will not be afraid of the power of the hands and feet, or endanger your life. This is called a minister. Also known as " Dan ", used as a place name, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Chronicles" Jane 50: "Attack Handan (Dan)." "Handan" is an ancient place name, that is, the city of Handan in Hebei Province today. It was the guardian land in the Spring and Autumn Period and later belonged to Jin. It is also known as " war ", meaning war, "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Japanese Book Type B" Jian 62: "Lidan (War) Cut."

Han silk script is used as place name, "Mawangdui. Line 296 of the Book of Strategists in the Warring States Period: "The king of Liang (Liang) lives in Shanfu, a city of ten thousand feet, and a million yuan guard.” Shanfu is the name of the Lu country in the Spring and Autumn Period, and its address is in the south of Shanxian County, Shandong Province. Also known as " war ", "Mawangdui. The 140th line of the Old Unknown Book before the Second Volume of Lao Zi: "Single (battle), I (victory) outside, and blessing is born inside." It means that if you win battles outside, there will be blessings in the country. "Mawangdui. The 207th line of Laozi's Second Edition: "Fuzi (kindness), single (battle) means I (victory), and the rule is solid." It means the virtue of kindness. stable.

"Shuowen": "Single, big. From 吅, 𠦆, 吅 also sound. Que." Duan Yucai's note: "When it is "Da Yan also", shallow people delete the word "yan". For example, "诬, add "Yan Ye", Qian Ren also deleted the word "Yan". "Er Ya" and "Guang Ya" say that "big" has no "single", and it is extended to "double" opposition."
humanum_short_description_en: A golden inscription on a tree branch tied with stones, is a primitive weapon. The original meaning is a weapon used for hunting or combat.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象在樹枝上綁上石刀（伍仕謙），是一種武器，用於打獵或戰爭。中間的田形可能象在柄部纏繞的繩索，以便投擲後收回（劉興隆），也有可能象綁着的石頭(谷衍奎)。從「單」為聲符兼義符的字與狩獵或戰爭有關。如「戰」表示戰爭，「彈」表示彈弓，「殫」表示竭盡，「殫殘」指毁滅。「單」表示一個，可能是假借義。

　　甲骨文用作族氏名、地名，如「東單」、「南單」、「西單」、「北單」是一些王族的氏族；如作為地名來說，就是一些王族的居住地（俞偉超）。金文用作國名，國姓是姬，其後以國名為姓氏，單伯鬲：「單伯（伯）邍父乍（作）中（仲）姞尊鬲。」「單伯」是單國君主，爵位是伯，「邍父」是單伯的名字，「鬲」是炊器，又是盛食物的器皿，全句意謂單伯邍父為仲姞鑄造了鬲。

　　戰國竹簡下加「口」旁為飾筆作「嘼」（即「獸」字所從），通假為「憚」，表示畏懼，《郭店簡．六德》簡16：「句（苟）淒（濟）夫人之善也，勞丌（其）股肱之力弗敢嘼（憚）也，危丌（其）死弗敢愛也，胃（謂）之[臣]。」「股肱」是大腿和胳膊，多用來比喻輔佐之臣，意謂如果能夠增益人之善德，勞役其手足之力也不怕，危及生命也不吝惜，這就叫臣。又通假為「鄲」，用作地名，《睡虎地秦簡．編年記》簡50壹：「攻邯單（鄲）。」「邯鄲」是古地名，即今河北省邯鄲市，春秋時是衛地，後屬晉。又通假為「戰」，表示打仗，《睡虎地秦簡．日書乙種》簡62：「利單（戰）伐。」

　　漢帛書用作地名，《馬王堆．戰國縱橫家書》第296行：「粱（梁）王在單父，以萬丈之城，百萬之守。」「單父」是春秋魯國邑名，故址在今山東省單縣南。又通假為「戰」，《馬王堆．老子乙本卷前古佚書》第140行：「單（戰）朕（勝）於外，福生於內。」意謂在外打勝仗，國內便有福祥。《馬王堆．老子乙本》第207行：「夫茲（慈），以單（戰）則朕（勝），以守則固。」表示慈愛之德，施於戰爭，則會勝利，施於防守，則會穩固。

　　《說文》：「單，大也。从吅、𠦆，吅亦聲。闕。」段玉裁注：「當爲『大言也』，淺人刪『言』字。如『誣，加言也』，淺人亦刪『言』字。《爾雅》、《廣雅》說『大』皆無『單』，引伸爲『雙』之反對。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象在樹枝上捆上石頭，是一種原始的武器。本義是一種用於打獵或作戰的武器。

  • there is only a single, unique Mickey Mouse 單/单

①不復雜：單純。簡單。單調(diào)。
②獨一：單獨。單一。單詞。
③只，僅：做事單靠熱情不夠。
④奇數的：單日。單號。
⑤薄，弱：單薄。
⑥衣服被褥只有一層的：單褲。單衣。
⑦覆蓋用的布：被單。牀單。
⑧記載事物用的紙片：單據。傳單。名單。
⑨和尚稱禪堂的坐牀。

單獨 [ dān dú ]: alone; by oneself; on one's own

Kanshudo mnemonic:ten (十) x two mouths (吅) in the rice field (田) - should be simple!
Chinese: The chatterbox makes a list of his top ten brain teasers he likes to do when there is no one to talk to.
Meaning: list
Hanzi: 单
Story: The farmers group together in an effort to stop dangerous animals from eating their livestock and crops. They make a list of all the locations where they've found animal horns in their ten rice fields.
Kind: traditional

單字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dān］
［《廣韻》都寒切，平寒，端。］
“单1”的繁体字。
(1)单独；一个。
(2)引申为孤独。
(3)谓衣物等单层。
(4)指用单层布帛制成的衣物。
(5)引申谓衣物单薄。
(6)泛指衰弱；寡少。
(7)简单；单纯。参见“單方”、“單調”。
(8)轮番更休。《诗·大雅·公刘》：“其軍三單。”毛传：“三單，相襲也。”陈奂传疏引胡承珙後笺：“三單者，即《周禮》‘凡起徒役，無過家一人’之謂。蓋止用正卒爲軍，不及其羡，故曰‘單’。三軍，故曰‘三單’。傳云‘相襲’者，猶言相代。則三軍之中，尚有更休叠上之法。”亦指相袭，继承。《书·洛诰》：“考朕昭子刑，乃單文祖德。”曾运乾正读：“單，襲也。言父死子繼，周家傳國常典。”一说指光大。参阅周秉钧《尚书易解》。
(9)记载事、物的纸片或票证。
(10)僧人坐禅、礼佛之具。
(11)古代钱卜用语。钱卜时，以三钱掷之，两面一背为单，两背一面为拆，三钱皆背为重，三钱皆面为交。见《仪礼·士冠礼》“筮與席所卦者”唐孔颖达疏。参阅清钱大昕《十驾斋养新录·筮用钱》。

單字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　單； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页200第25
【唐韻】都寒切【集韻】【韻會】多寒切，?音丹。【說文】大也。　又【書·洛誥】乃單文祖德。【傳】單，盡也。【詩·小雅】俾爾單厚。【箋】單，盡也。【禮·郊特牲】惟爲社事單出里。【鄭語】夏禹能單平水土。【晉語】單善而內辱之。　又【揚雄·甘泉賦】單埢垣兮。【註】單，周也。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】牂牁郡母單縣。　又【廣韻】單複也。【正字通】單者，複之對也。【杜甫詩】歲暮衣裳單。　又【玉篇】一也，隻也。【詩·大雅】其軍三單。【箋】大國之制，三軍以其餘卒爲羨，單者無羨卒也。【禮·禮器】鬼神之祭單席。【史記·信陵君傳】今單車來代之。【後漢·耿恭傳】以單兵固守孤城。又【高彪傳】家傳單寒。　又姓。【廣韻】可單氏，後攺爲單氏。　又【集韻】唐干切，音壇。亦姓也。鄭有櫟邑大夫單伯。通作檀。　又【廣韻】市連切【集韻】【韻會】時連切，?音蟬。【廣韻】單于。【前漢·匈奴傳】單于者，廣大之貌也。言其象天，單于然也。　又【爾雅·釋天】太歲在卯曰單閼。【釋文】單音蟬，又音丹，或音善

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dān］
["Guangyun" are all cold cut, flat cold, end. ]
Traditional characters for "单1".
(1) Alone; one.
(2) The extension is loneliness.
(3) It is a single layer such as clothing.
(4) Refers to clothing made of a single layer of fabric.
(5) By extension, the clothes are thin.
(6) Generally refers to weakness; few and few.
(7) Simple; simple. See "unilateral", "monotonic".
(8) Take turns to rest. "Poetry·Daya·Gong Liu": "The three orders of his army." Mao Chuan: "Three orders, the same as each other." Chen Huan Chuan quoted Hu Chengyu's postscript: "Three orders, that is, the "Zhou Li" "Fan Qi Apprenticeship" , There is no such thing as a single person in the family. Gaizhi uses the pawn as the army, and it is not enviable, so it is called'single'. The three armies, so it is called'three singles.' Among the three armies, there is still a way to stack up." It also refers to attack and inheritance. "Shu·Luogao": "The test of Zhaozi's punishment is Shanwen Zude." Zeng Yunqian was reading: "Single, attack also. Saying that father died and son succeeded, the Zhou family passed on the country's permanent code." One said that Guangda. See Zhou Bingjun's "Easy Explanation of Shangshu".
(9) A piece of paper or ticket that records things and things.
(10) A tool for monks to sit in meditation and worship Buddha.
(11) Ancient terms of money divination. When making money, three coins are tossed, with two sides and one back for single, two backs and one side for splitting, three cashes are heavy, and three cashes are handed in face. See "Yi Li·Shi Guan Li" "Tang Kong Ying Da Shu," "Chen and Xi Suo Gua". Please refer to Qing Qian Daxin's "New Record of Ten Drivers' Free Raising·Song Money".
